statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND last_service_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND vehicle_model = 'Camry';

DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE mechanic = 'John Doe' AND cost > 500;
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year = 2015;

DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM mechanics WHERE specialization = 'Engine Repair' AND name = 'John Doe';
